thread.title: Sawyer Rank
thread.title_full: Olive Oil Lovers reviewed by Sawyer Rank

author: Sawyer Rank
title: Sawyer Rank
text: I go through a bottle in two weeks, so I enjoy choosing varieties from different locations. A fresh bottle from a new region is always a wonderful discovery. I enjoy the robust Sicilian oils the best, but I like the others too. I aspire to try fine oil from countries outside the large Mediterranean producers. A premium bottle of olive oil reflects the hearts and souls of its makers and the land it was born from, and such is transferred into the taste and enjoyment of the consumer.
